quotes.text: “A day without sunshine is like, you know, night.”
quotes.author: Steve Martin

quotes.text: “People who think they know everything are a great annoyance to those of us who do”
quotes.author: Isaac Asimov

quotes.text: “Age is something that doesn't matter, unless you are a cheese.”
quotes.author: Luis Bunuel

quotes.text: “Only the mediocre are always at their best.”
quotes.author: Jean Giraudoux

quotes.text: “Holy hell, son, you're about as useful as a cock-flavored lollipop!”
quotes.author: Patches O’Houlihan

quotes.text: “Nobody makes me bleed my own blood - nobody!”
quotes.author: White Goodman

quotes.text: “What soap is to the body, laughter is to the soul.”
quotes.author: Yiddish proverb
